Robin', 'Robert J. Doherty', 'Steven DePaul', 'Donna Deitch', 'Paris Barclay', 'Jake Paltrow', 'Jesse Bochco', 'Gregory Hoblit', 'Matthew Penn'], 'Studio': ['FOX']} Review Text: One of my favorite shows of all time! Except when Jimmy Smits was dying... ;-) The acting on this show is superb. Review Title: GREAT SHOW! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2015/01/10 Average Rating: 4.9 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Michael Engler', 'Craig Zisk', 'Jennifer Getzinger', 'Jann Turner', 'Tricia Brock', 'Michael Lehmann', 'Alan Poul', 'Miguel Arteta', 'Anna Boden', 'Ryan Fleck'], 'Producers': ['Laura Linney', 'Neal H. Moritz', 'Vivian Cannon', 'Darlene Hunt', 'Jenny Bicks'], 'Starring': ['Laura Linney', 'Oliver Platt', 'Gabriel Basso']} Review Text: I have loved this series from the start. Laura Linney does a wonderful job of acting, as do her partners. I am not a sentimental person; I rarely cry during emotional scenes. But this series did me in. What a wonderful story! Review Title: WHAT A SHOW! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2017/03/19 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium', 'English Dialogue Boost: Low', 'Italiano', '日本語', 'Português', 'Deutsch', 'हिन्दी', 'Español (España)', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Polski', 'Čeština', 'Magyar', 'Türkçe', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'العربية', 'Čeština', 'Dansk', 'Deutsch', 'Ελληνικά', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Suomi', 'Filipino', 'Français', 'עברית', 'हिन्दी', 'Magyar', 'Indonesia', 'Italiano', '日本語', '한국어', 'Bahasa Melayu', 'Norsk Bokmål', 'Nederlands', 'Polski', 'Português (Brasil)', 'Português (Portugal)', 'Română', 'Русский', 'Svenska', 'தமிழ்', 'తెలుగు', 'ไทย', 'Türkçe', 'Українська', 'Tiếng Việt', '中文（简体）', '中文（繁體）'], 'Directors': ['Scott Ellis'], 'Producers': ['Amy Sherman-Palladino', 'Daniel Palladino', 'Sheila Lawrence', 'Dhana Rivera Gilbert'], 'Starring': ['Alex Borstein', 'Marin Hinkle', 'Rachel Brosnahan'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']} Review Text: Super pilot! Great premise! Wonderful acting! Okay, enough of that. Great show - please bring more!

BTW, love the music! Review Title: Super pilot! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Murder in Suburbia Review Date: 2017/06/07 Categories: Suspense, Drama Product Description: ["Detective Inspector Kate Ashurst, a graduate of a posh girls' academy, has a sharp, analytical mind; her working-class partner, Detective Sergeant Emma Scribbins, relies on her instincts. Together this sassy, sexy investigative team uncovers the dark urges behind suburban Middleford's placid façade."] Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Edward Bennet', 'David Innes Edwards', 'Douglas Mackinnon'], 'Producers': ['Sharon Bloom'], 'Starring': ['Caroline Catz', 'Lisa Faulkner', 'Jeremy Sheffield']} Review Text: I loved Season 1 of this show. I like the sly punchlines and the camaraderie between the two female stars (and their boss is good eye candy!). I was looking forward to Season 2, but the closed captioning (which I need) is out of kilter, making it very difficult to watch. :-( Review Title: Season 1 great, Season 2 needs help with closed captioning Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2018/05/08 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Mathew Read'], 'Producers': ['Whitby Davison Productions'], 'Starring': ['Eddie Marsan'], 'Studio': ['Not Specified']} Review Text: My favorite kind of movie - it teaches you something and it leaves you with a good feeling! Super! I had no idea the Paralympics went all the way back to WWII and started in England. Must explain why Prince Harry is so involved. Watch it - you won't regret it! Review Title: Great movie! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2018/05/08 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Brian Welsh'], 'Producers': ['David Wolstencroft'], 'Starring': ['David Tennant', 'Toby Kebbell', 'Sophie Okonedo'], 'Studio': ['PBS']} Review Text: Great show with an unexpected ending. Not your typical attorney-client movie! Review Title: Not your typical attorney-client movie! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual exhibits a strong preference for high-quality, emotionally engaging television series and films, consistently providing ratings near the maximum value. Key recurring sentiments highlight appreciation for well-executed storytelling, superb acting performances, and unique premises, indicating that narrative depth is prioritized. Themes involving strong female leads and complex interpersonal dynamics resonate particularly well, suggesting an affinity for character-driven plots.

Regarding content, there is a noticeable inclination towards genres that include drama, suspense, and educational themes, often expressing enjoyment of both lighthearted entertainment and more serious subject matter. The individual's appreciation for diverse representational elements, including significant social issues, is evident, particularly in relation to historical contexts like the Paralympics.

Quality is consistently valued, with an apparent preference for productions associated with renowned studios and experienced directors, reinforcing the importance of production standards. While there are price sensitivities hinted at through reviews regarding accessibility features like closed captioning, the overall trend suggests a willingness to invest in content that delivers both educational value and emotional impact. Thus, this shopper's core preferences point towards a blend of artistic quality, immersive storytelling, and representation that informs their viewing choices.

target_interaction.title: Such a sweet movie!
target_interaction.text: Loved this movie!  Such a gentle treatment of a mental problem - exemplifies "it takes a village."
description: Lars, a sweet but quirky-to-delusional guy, has found the girl of his dreams, a life-sized doll named Bianca. When he develops feelings for Margo, an attractive co-worker, Lars finds himself lost in a hilariously unique love triangle. Starring Ryan Gosling ("The Notebook").
